2. Local Install of RTD¶

2.1. As described¶

** insert macsetup.rst/RTD Locally

2.2. Other misc¶

run redis server .. code-block:: bash

$ brew services start redis

install mactex .. code-block:: bash

$ brew cask install mactex

2.3. Running the server¶

2.3.1. First time¶

2.3.2. Every time¶

enter the virtualenv (source venv/bin/activate) Run server (python manage.py runserver ip.ip.ip.ip:8000)
